Cogan Junction: When a train is signalled from the Penarth Branch towards Cardiff the protecting signal for Cogan Junction is C424signal which is the controlling signal for movements into the Down Goods Loop.  The signal that controls CoganJunction, C426 is too close the junction in the event of a SPAD incident
